attributes.action: Allow Ghurka Widows & Their Children, without having to re-apply for visa's, to remain in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ghurka widows are forced to leave Britain after their loved ones have died in action. They should be automatically be given citzenship. We must stand by those who lay their lives down for ours, so please sign this petition and show your support not just for our troops, but for their loved ones aswell, Thank you.
